summary.description: > CORRECT NAME OF TOOL COULD ALSO BE 'Response Lithium Network' | Prospective cohort study of early biosignatures of response to lithium in bipolar-I-disorders | Optimizing response to lithium treatment through personalized evaluation of individuals with bipolar I disorder: the R-LiNK initiative | R-Link is a multinational study funded by the European Unionâ€™s Horizon 2020 Research and Innovation programme. R-Link involves eight European countries including France, United Kingdom, Denmark, Spain, Norway, Sweden, Germany and Italy
summary.name: R-LiNK
